title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - GenAI-Powered Contextual Security Analysis & Remediation (ISV315)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 生成式AI驱动的上下文安全分析与修复 (ISV315)
abstract: For ISVs, managing security and costs in multi-tenant environments is complex: threats can spread across boundaries, cost attribution becomes unclear, and understanding true impact radius is challenging. This technical session demonstrates how to overcome these challenges by mapping tenant infrastructure relationships using Amazon Neptune and OpenSearch. Watch how graph-based architecture with GenAI integration provides deep contextual understanding of cross-tenant dependencies. Learn patterns for security analysis and cost attribution that reduce operational risks in multi-tenant environments.
abstract_cn: 对于ISV而言，在多租户环境中管理安全性和成本非常复杂：威胁可能跨边界传播，成本归属变得不清晰，理解真实影响范围也极具挑战性。本技术会议演示如何通过使用Amazon Neptune和OpenSearch映射租户基础设施关系来克服这些挑战。观看基于图的架构如何与GenAI集成，提供对跨租户依赖关系的深度上下文理解。学习用于安全分析和成本归属的模式，以降低多租户环境中的运营风险。
